statements.select:
WITH CTE (ID, HierID, Level, SeqNo) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , 1 AS Level , CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SeqNo FROM dbo.BGCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
And AA.ID = #ParentID#
AND AA.ParentID IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(BB.HierID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , BB.Level + 1 AS MenuLevel , CAST(BB.SeqNo + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SeqNo FROM dbo.BGCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.ID ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HierID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CategoryName , AA.ParentID , AA.Category1 , AA.Category2 , AA.Category3 , AA.Category4 , AA.Category5 , AA.SortOrder , AA.UseYn
, BB.HierID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.Level -1) * 5) + BB.SeqNo + '. ' + AA.CategoryName AS HierName , BB.Level
FROM dbo.BGCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CategoryName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CategoryName , AA.ParentID , AA.InfoNoticeID , AA.SortOrder , AA.UseYn
, AA.Category1 , AA.Category2 , AA.Category3 , AA.Category4 , AA.Category5
, C1.CategoryName as Category1Name , C2.CategoryName as Category2Name , C3.CategoryName as Category3Name , C4.CategoryName as Category4Name , C5.CategoryName as Category5Name
FROM dbo.BGCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BGCategory C1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category1 = C1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BGCategory C2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category2 = C2.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BGCategory C3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category3 = C3.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BGCategory C4 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category4 = C4.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BGCategory C5 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category5 = C5.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BGCategory ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CategoryName, ParentID, Category1, Category2, Category3, Category4, Category5, InfoNoticeID, UseYn, SortOrder ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CategoryName#, #ParentID#, #Category1#, #Category2#, #Category3#, #Category4#, #Category5#, #InfoNoticeID#, #UseYn#, #SortOrder# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BGCategory SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, CategoryName= #CategoryName# , ParentID = #ParentID# , Category1 = #Category1# , Category2 = #Category2# , Category3 = #Category3# , Category4 = #Category4# , Category5 = #Category5# , InfoNoticeID= #InfoNoticeID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# WHERE ID = #ID#
UPDATE dbo.BGCategory SET Category1 = #Category1# , Category2 = #Category2# , Category3 = #Category3# , Category4 = #Category4# , Category5 = #Category5# WHERE ID = #ID#
